t: Amazon Leadership Principles Interview (questions + tips)
s: Take accountability. Do all of, if not more than, what the job requires. The intention is to stimulate taking risks, having pride, and sacrificing for the business. Amazon wants folks who take big bets, hold themself to high expectations, and put in the hard work.

t: Mind The Customer Expectation Gap
s: February 3, 2017 - Last week I returned from NRF's "Big Show" in New York City. The annual event shines a light on the future of retail. Over three days I sat in on a numbers of sessions and walked the show floor. The overall theme is that customer expectations are rising and a gap is being created.

t: 2022 brand visibility tips for Amazon | Mobile Marketing Magazine
